items.sentence: I need to wrap my older sister's dinner in plastic wrap.
I got into trouble with the police for driving too fast.
I had to leave the theater in the middle of the concert.
Keep in mind that you're not as young as you used to be.
Tom managed to find a solution which satisfied everyone.
I asked Tom what he thought the right decision would be.
When I'm hot, a glass of cool water really refreshes me.
You can't purchase this medicine without a prescription.
Tom decided to spend his holiday in Australia this year.
Tom wants to know if he can keep that book you sent him.
Tom always wakes me up when he comes home late at night.
Tom pretended that he understood, even though he didn't.
Tom was given the same chance that you and I were given.
Tom left early, so he could avoid the rush hour traffic.
Tom knows that Mary doesn't want him to do that anymore.
This watch needs to be fixed. It gains 20 minutes a day.
Tom, you're the most inconsiderate person I've ever met.
Tom always wondered what it was like inside a spaceship.
Tom's grandparents are coming to visit for Thanksgiving.
Tom just wanted all this to be over as soon as possible.
